footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Rosaria | Update Date: 10/06/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __R5 Wavebreaker's Fin__ Due it's high base atk and DMG% passive it becomes Rosaria's best freeze weapon at R5.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Staff of Homa, R1 Wavebreaker's fin, Primordial Winged Jade-spear, The Catch, Favonius Lance
